item: A book entitled ‘Desert Animals That Can Be Eaten'
explanation: In this survival situation in the Atacama Desert, food scarcity will be a critical challenge. The book on 'Desert Animals That Can Be Eaten' will provide vital information on potential sources of sustenance in the barren environment. Identifying edible animals will be crucial for ensuring the group's survival until rescue arrives. With limited provisions and extreme temperatures, knowing what wildlife can be safely consumed becomes a priority. This knowledge can be the difference between starvation and maintaining energy levels in order to endure the harsh conditions until assistance reaches the group.
